summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works to amend the plans for the improvement of Pike Place, from Pike Street to Stewart Street; Pike Street, from Western Avenue to First Avenue, and Western Avenue from Virginia Street to Stewart Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and regrading the same, and by constructing all necessary bulkheads, retaining walls and stairways, and by planking the same, as provided for by Ordinance No. 13267, creating Local Improvement District No. 1200, and appropriating money therefor.
